title: PSBs charged Rs 2k cr in FY24 for not keeping minimum balance
description: Among lenders, Punjab National Bank charged the highest sum of Rs 633 crore followed by Bank of Baroda at ?386 crore for non-maintenance quarterly balance. Indian Bank charged Rs 369 crore as penalty for non-maintenance of average monthly balance.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
